description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 353 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 85,683 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 128,531.
